analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 是善男子、善女人等，以何驗知有此三千大千國土及餘十方無邊世界天、龍、藥叉、阿素洛等來至其處，觀禮、讀誦彼所書持甚深般若波羅蜜多，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎，合掌右遶、歡喜護念？
analyzed: 是善男子、善女人等，以何驗知有此三千大千國土及餘十方無邊世界天、龍、藥叉、阿素洛等來至其處，觀禮、讀誦彼所書持甚深般若波羅蜜多，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎，合掌右遶、歡喜護念？
translated: By what evidence can these good men and good women know that there are devas, nāgas, yakṣas, asuras, and so forth from this trichiliocosm and other worlds in the ten directions who come to their places, observe, venerate, recite, and chant this profound prajñā-pāramitā that they have written out, make offerings and pay homage to it, respect and praise it, join their palms, circumambulate it, rejoice, and protect it?

original: 」爾時，佛告天帝釋言：
analyzed: 」爾時，佛告天帝釋言：
translated: At that time, the Buddha told Śakra, Lord of the Devas:

original: 「是善男子、善女人等，若見般若波羅蜜多甚深經典所在之處有妙光明，或聞其處異香氛郁，或復聞有微細樂音，當知爾時有大神力威德熾盛諸天、龍等來至其處，觀禮、讀誦彼所書持甚深般若波羅蜜多，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎，合掌右遶、歡喜護念。
analyzed: 「是善男子、善女人等，若見般若波羅蜜多甚深經典所在之處有妙光明，或聞其處異香氛郁，或復聞有微細樂音，當知爾時有大神力威德熾盛諸天、龍等來至其處，觀禮、讀誦彼所書持甚深般若波羅蜜多，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎，合掌右遶、歡喜護念。
translated: If these good men and good women see a wonderful light in the place where the profound sutra of prajnaparamita is, or smell a wonderful fragrance there, or hear subtle music, they should know that at that time devas and dragons with great spiritual powers and majestic virtue have come to that place, to observe, pay homage, read and recite the profound prajnaparamita that is written there, to make offerings, pay respects, revere and praise it, to join palms, circumambulate to the right, and joyfully protect and think of it.

original: 「復次，憍尸迦！
analyzed: 「復次，憍尸迦！
translated: Furthermore, Kausika!

original: 是善男子、善女人等修鮮淨行嚴麗其處，至心供養甚深般若波羅蜜多，當知爾時有大神力威德熾盛諸天、龍等來至其處，觀禮、讀誦彼所書持甚深般若波羅蜜多，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎，合掌右遶、歡喜護念。
analyzed: 是善男子、善女人等修鮮淨行嚴麗其處，至心供養甚深般若波羅蜜多，當知爾時有大神力威德熾盛諸天、龍等來至其處，觀禮、讀誦彼所書持甚深般若波羅蜜多，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎，合掌右遶、歡喜護念。
translated: These good men and good women cultivate pure conduct and adorn their abode. With utmost sincerity, they make offerings to the profound prajñā-pāramitā. One should know that at that time, devas and nāgas with great spiritual powers and majestic virtue will come to that place, observe, pay homage, and chant the profound prajñā-pāramitā that they have written and upheld. They will make offerings, pay reverence, respect, and praise it, join their palms in right-circling, and joyfully protect and think of it.

original: 「憍尸迦！
analyzed: 「憍尸迦！
translated: Kauśika!

original: 隨有如是具大神力威德熾盛諸天、龍等來至其處，此中所有惡鬼、邪神驚怖退散無敢住者。
analyzed: 隨有如是具大神力威德熾盛諸天、龍等來至其處，此中所有惡鬼、邪神驚怖退散無敢住者。
translated: Wherever there are such devas and nāgas with great spiritual powers and majestic virtue who come to that place, the evil ghosts and deviant spirits will be frightened and flee in all directions, not daring to stay.

original: 由此因緣，是善男子、善女人等心便廣大起淨勝解，所修善業倍復增明，諸有所為皆無障礙。
analyzed: 由此因緣，是善男子、善女人等心便廣大起淨勝解，所修善業倍復增明，諸有所為皆無障礙。
translated: For this reason, the minds of these good men and good women will become vast and give rise to pure and excellent understanding. The wholesome karma they cultivate will increase even more, and whatever they do will be unobstructed.

original: 「以是故，憍尸迦！
analyzed: 「以是故，憍尸迦！
translated: Therefore, Kauśika!

original: 甚深般若波羅蜜多隨所在處，應當周匝除去糞穢，掃拭、塗治、香水散灑，敷設寶座而安置之；
analyzed: 甚深般若波羅蜜多隨所在處，應當周匝除去糞穢，掃拭、塗治、香水散灑，敷設寶座而安置之；
translated: Wherever the profound prajñā-pāramitā is, one should remove the filth all around, sweep and clean it, sprinkle it with fragrant water, set up a jeweled seat and place it there;

original: 燒香、散花、張施幰蓋，寶幢、幡鐸間飾其中，眾妙、珍奇、金銀寶器、衣服、瓔珞、伎樂、燈明，種種雜綵莊嚴其處。
analyzed: 燒香、散花、張施幰蓋，寶幢、幡鐸間飾其中，眾妙、珍奇、金銀寶器、衣服、瓔珞、伎樂、燈明，種種雜綵莊嚴其處。
translated: burn incense, scatter flowers, hang canopies, with jeweled banners, flags, and bells adorning the space in between, various precious gold, silver, and jeweled vessels, clothing, necklaces, music, lamps, and colorful decorations adorning the place.

original: 若能如是供養般若波羅蜜多甚深經典，便有無量具大神力威德熾盛諸天、龍等來至其處，觀禮、讀誦彼所書持甚深般若波羅蜜多，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎，合掌右遶、歡喜護念。
analyzed: 若能如是供養般若波羅蜜多甚深經典，便有無量具大神力威德熾盛諸天、龍等來至其處，觀禮、讀誦彼所書持甚深般若波羅蜜多，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎，合掌右遶、歡喜護念。
translated: If one can make offerings in this way to the profound scriptures of prajñā-pāramitā, then there will be innumerable devas, nāgas, and others with great spiritual powers and blazing majestic virtue who will come to that place, observe, pay homage, read and recite the profound prajñā-pāramitā that is written there, make offerings and respectfully praise it, join palms, circumambulate to the right, and joyfully protect and think of it.

original: 「復次，憍尸迦！
analyzed: 「復次，憍尸迦！
translated: Furthermore, Kauśika!

original: 是善男子、善女人等若能如是供養恭敬、尊重讚歎甚深般若波羅蜜多，決定當得身心無倦、身心安樂、身心調柔、身心輕利。
analyzed: 是善男子、善女人等若能如是供養恭敬、尊重讚歎甚深般若波羅蜜多，決定當得身心無倦、身心安樂、身心調柔、身心輕利。
translated: These good men and good women, if they are able to make offerings, pay respects, revere, and praise the profound prajñā-pāramitā in this way, will definitely attain an untiring body and mind, physical and mental bliss, physical and mental pliancy, and physical and mental lightness.

original: 繫心般若波羅蜜多，夜寢息時無諸惡夢唯得善夢，謂見如來、應、正等覺身真金色相好莊嚴，放大光明普照一切，聲聞、菩薩前後圍遶，身處眾中，聞佛為說布施、淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多乃至無上正等菩提相應之法，復聞分別布施、淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多乃至無上正等菩提相應之義。
analyzed: 繫心般若波羅蜜多，夜寢息時無諸惡夢唯得善夢，謂見如來、應、正等覺身真金色相好莊嚴，放大光明普照一切，聲聞、菩薩前後圍遶，身處眾中，聞佛為說布施、淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多乃至無上正等菩提相應之法，復聞分別布施、淨戒、安忍、精進、靜慮、般若波羅蜜多乃至無上正等菩提相應之義。
translated: Focusing their minds on prajñā-pāramitā, when they sleep at night they will have no bad dreams but only good dreams, such as seeing the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One, with a body the color of true gold, adorned with the major and minor marks, emitting great light illuminating everything, surrounded in front and back by śrāvakas and bodhisattvas. They will see themselves in the midst of the assembly, hearing the Buddha expound the Dharma of the perfections of giving, morality, patience, diligence, meditation, and prajñā, up to the associated teachings of supreme perfect enlightenment, and further hearing the distinctions of the perfections of giving, morality, patience, diligence, meditation, and prajñā, up to the associated meanings of supreme perfect enlightenment.

original: 或於夢中見菩提樹，其量高廣眾寶莊嚴，有菩薩摩訶薩往詣其下結跏趺坐，證得無上正等菩提，轉妙法輪度有情眾。🔽或於夢中見有無量百千俱胝那庾多數大菩薩眾，論議決擇種種法義，謂應如是成熟有情、嚴淨佛土，修菩薩行降伏魔軍，斷煩惱習趣證無上正等菩提。
analyzed: 或於夢中見菩提樹，其量高廣眾寶莊嚴，有菩薩摩訶薩往詣其下結跏趺坐，證得無上正等菩提，轉妙法輪度有情眾。 或於夢中見有無量百千俱胝那庾多數大菩薩眾，論議決擇種種法義，謂應如是成熟有情、嚴淨佛土，修菩薩行降伏魔軍，斷煩惱習趣證無上正等菩提。
translated: Or in dreams they see the Bodhi tree, lofty and vast, adorned with myriad jewels, with a bodhisattva-mahāsattva going to its foot, sitting cross-legged, realizing supreme perfect enlightenment, turning the sublime Dharma wheel, and liberating multitudes of beings.🔽Or in dreams they see innumerable hundreds of thousands of koṭis of nayutas of great bodhisattvas discussing and discerning various Dharma meanings, namely, how to mature beings, purify buddha-lands, cultivate bodhisattva practices, subdue the demon hordes, cut off the habits of afflictions, and attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

original: 或復夢中見十方界各有無量百千俱胝那庾多佛，亦聞其聲，謂某世界有某如來、應、正等覺，若干百千俱胝那庾多菩薩摩訶薩聲聞弟子恭敬圍遶說如是法。
analyzed: 或復夢中見十方界各有無量百千俱胝那庾多佛，亦聞其聲，謂某世界有某如來、應、正等覺，若干百千俱胝那庾多菩薩摩訶薩聲聞弟子恭敬圍遶說如是法。
translated: Or they may further dream of seeing in the ten directions each innumerable hundreds of thousands of koṭis of nayutas of buddhas, and also hear their voices, saying, In such a world there is such a Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One, with so many hundreds of thousands of koṭis of nayutas of bodhisattva-mahāsattvas and śrāvaka disciples respectfully surrounding him, expounding the Dharma like this.🔽Here is the corrected and aligned text:

original: 或復夢中見十方界各有無量百千俱胝那庾多佛入般涅槃，彼一一佛般涅槃後，各有施主為供養佛設利羅故，以妙七寶各起無量百千俱胝那庾多數大窣堵波，復於一一窣堵波所，各以無量上妙花鬘、塗散等香、衣服、瓔珞、寶幢、幡蓋、眾妙、珍奇、伎樂、燈明，經無量劫供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
analyzed: 或復夢中見十方界各有無量百千俱胝那庾多佛入般涅槃，彼一一佛般涅槃後，各有施主為供養佛設利羅故，以妙七寶各起無量百千俱胝那庾多數大窣堵波，復於一一窣堵波所，各以無量上妙花鬘、塗散等香、衣服、瓔珞、寶幢、幡蓋、眾妙、珍奇、伎樂、燈明，經無量劫供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
translated: Or in dreams they see countless hundreds of thousands of koṭis of nayutas of Buddhas in the ten directions entering parinirvāṇa. After each Buddha's parinirvāṇa, there are donors who, in order to make offerings to the Buddha's relics, erect countless hundreds of thousands of koṭis of nayutas of great stūpas made of the seven precious substances. At each stūpa site, they make offerings of countless sublime flower garlands, ointments, scattered [flowers], clothing, necklaces, jeweled banners, pennants, canopies, various rare and wonderful musical performances, and lamps, for countless eons, making offerings, paying respects, venerating, and praising.

original: 「憍尸迦！
analyzed: 「憍尸迦！
translated: Kauśika!

original: 是善男子、善女人等見如是類諸善夢相，若睡若覺身心安樂，諸天神等益其精氣，令彼自覺身體輕便。
analyzed: 是善男子、善女人等見如是類諸善夢相，若睡若覺身心安樂，諸天神等益其精氣，令彼自覺身體輕便。
translated: These good men and good women see such kinds of good dream signs. Whether sleeping or awake, their bodies and minds are at ease. The various celestial spirits increase their vital energy, causing them to naturally feel that their bodies are light and convenient.

original: 由此因緣，不多貪著飲食、醫藥、衣服、臥具，於四供養其心輕微，如瑜伽師入勝妙定，由彼定力滋潤身心，從定出已雖遇美饍而心輕微，此亦如是。
analyzed: 由此因緣，不多貪著飲食、醫藥、衣服、臥具，於四供養其心輕微，如瑜伽師入勝妙定，由彼定力滋潤身心，從定出已雖遇美饍而心輕微，此亦如是。
translated: For this reason, they are not overly attached to food, drink, medicine, clothing, and bedding, and their minds are light regarding the four offerings, just as a yoga practitioner enters a supreme and wonderful concentration. By the power of that concentration, the body and mind are nourished. Even if they encounter delicious food after emerging from concentration, their minds are still light. This is also like that.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 憍尸迦！
analyzed: 憍尸迦！
translated: Kauśika!

original: 是善男子、善女人等，由此三千大千國土及餘十方無邊世界，一切如來應正等覺、聲聞、菩薩、天、龍、藥叉、阿素洛等具大神力勝威德者慈悲護念，以妙精氣冥注身心，令其志勇體充盛故。
analyzed: 是善男子、善女人等，由此三千大千國土及餘十方無邊世界，一切如來應正等覺、聲聞、菩薩、天、龍、藥叉、阿素洛等具大神力勝威德者慈悲護念，以妙精氣冥注身心，令其志勇體充盛故。
translated: This is because all the Tathāgatas, Arhats, Samyaksaṃbuddhas, Śrāvakas, Bodhisattvas, Devas, Nāgas, Yakṣas, Asuras, and others with great spiritual powers and supreme majestic virtue in this trichiliocosm and the boundless worlds of the ten directions, with their compassionate protection and care, secretly bestow their wonderful vital energy upon their bodies and minds, causing their resolve to be courageous and their bodies to be full and vigorous.

original: 「憍尸迦！
analyzed: 「憍尸迦！
translated: Kauśika!

original: 若善男子、善女人等，欲得如是現在種種功德勝利，應發一切智智心，以無所得為方便，於此般若波羅蜜多甚深經典，至心聽聞、受持、讀誦、精勤修學、如理思惟、書寫、解說、廣令流布。
analyzed: 若善男子、善女人等，欲得如是現在種種功德勝利，應發一切智智心，以無所得為方便，於此般若波羅蜜多甚深經典，至心聽聞、受持、讀誦、精勤修學、如理思惟、書寫、解說、廣令流布。
translated: If good men and good women wish to obtain such various present merits and benefits, they should give rise to the mind of omniscience, using non-apprehension as a skillful means, and with utmost sincerity listen to, uphold, read, recite, diligently practice, contemplate according to the meaning, write, explain, and widely disseminate this profound sutra of prajñā-pāramitā.

original: 「憍尸迦！
analyzed: 「憍尸迦！
translated: Kauśika!

original: 若善男子、善女人等，雖於般若波羅蜜多甚深經典，不能聽聞、受持、讀誦、精勤修學、如理思惟，廣為有情宣說流布，而但書寫眾寶嚴飾，復持無量上妙花鬘乃至燈明供養恭敬、尊重讚歎，亦得如前所說種種功德勝利。
analyzed: 若善男子、善女人等，雖於般若波羅蜜多甚深經典，不能聽聞、受持、讀誦、精勤修學、如理思惟，廣為有情宣說流布，而但書寫眾寶嚴飾，復持無量上妙花鬘乃至燈明供養恭敬、尊重讚歎，亦得如前所說種種功德勝利。
translated: If good men and good women, although unable to listen to, uphold, read, recite, diligently practice, contemplate according to the meaning, and widely proclaim and disseminate this profound sutra of prajñā-pāramitā, but only write it out, adorn it with various jewels, and further offer it with immeasurable wonderful flower garlands, and so forth up to lamps and lights, with respect, reverence, esteem, and praise, they will also obtain the various merits and benefits as explained above.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 憍尸迦！
analyzed: 憍尸迦！
translated: Kauśika!

original: 是善男子、善女人等，能廣利樂無量無邊諸有情故。
analyzed: 是善男子、善女人等，能廣利樂無量無邊諸有情故。
translated: Because these good men and good women are able to bring vast benefit and joy to innumerable sentient beings.

original: 「復次，憍尸迦！
analyzed: 「復次，憍尸迦！
translated: Furthermore, Kauśika!

original: 若善男子、善女人等以應一切智智心，用無所得為方便，於此般若波羅蜜多甚深經典，至心聽聞、受持、讀誦、精勤修學、如理思惟、書寫、解說、廣令流布，復持種種上妙花鬘乃至燈明而為供養。

translated: Therefore, this profound prajñā-pāramitā sūtra should be received with offerings of all kinds of the most wonderful flower garlands, and so forth, up to lamps, by all the worlds, gods, humans, and asuras, with respect, reverence, and praise.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 若有於此甚深般若波羅蜜多，至心聽聞、受持
analyzed: 若有於此甚深般若波羅蜜多，至心聽聞、受持

original: 、讀誦、精勤修學、如理思惟、書寫、解說、
analyzed: 、讀誦、精勤修學、如理思惟、書寫、解說、
translated: read and recite it, diligently practice and study it, contemplate it according to the principles, copy it, explain it,

original: 廣令流布，復以無量上妙花鬘乃至燈明供養恭
analyzed: 廣令流布，復以無量上妙花鬘乃至燈明供養恭
translated: and widely disseminate it, and further make offerings of all kinds of the most wonderful flower garlands, and so forth, up to lamps, with respect and reverence,

analyzed: 敬、尊重讚歎，決定不復墮諸惡趣、邊鄙、達
translated: They will be respected, revered, and praised, and will definitely no longer fall into the evil destinies, border regions,

original: 絮、蔑戾車中，不墮聲聞、獨覺等地，必趣無
analyzed: 絮、蔑戾車中，不墮聲聞、獨覺等地，必趣無
translated: barbarians, or the stage of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, but will surely proceed to

original: 上正等菩提，常見諸佛、恒聞正法、不離善友
analyzed: 上正等菩提，常見諸佛、恒聞正法、不離善友
translated: unsurpassed perfect enlightenment. They will always see the buddhas, constantly hear the right Dharma, and not be apart from good friends.

original: ，嚴淨佛土、成熟有情，從一佛國至一佛國，🔽以無量種上妙供具，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎諸佛
analyzed: ，嚴淨佛土、成熟有情，從一佛國至一佛國， 以無量種上妙供具，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎諸佛
translated: They will adorn and purify the buddha-lands and bring sentient beings to maturity, going from one buddha-land to another buddha-land,

original: 世尊及諸菩薩摩訶薩眾。
analyzed: 世尊及諸菩薩摩訶薩眾。
translated: and with immeasurable kinds of excellent offerings, they will make offerings to and respect the buddhas, the world-honored ones, and the assembly of bodhisattva-mahāsattvas.

original: 「復次，世尊！
analyzed: 「復次，世尊！
translated: Furthermore, World-Honored One!

original: 假使充滿三千世界佛設利羅以為一分，有書般若波羅蜜多甚深經典復為一分，此二分中我意寧取甚深般若波羅蜜多。
analyzed: 假使充滿三千世界佛設利羅以為一分，有書般若波羅蜜多甚深經典復為一分，此二分中我意寧取甚深般若波羅蜜多。
translated: If one were to fill the trichiliocosm with the Buddha's relics and make it one part, and if one were to write out the profound prajñā-pāramitā sūtra and make it another part, I would choose the profound prajñā-pāramitā from these two parts.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 一切如來、應、正等覺及三千界佛設利羅，皆從般若波羅蜜多而出生故；
analyzed: 一切如來、應、正等覺及三千界佛設利羅，皆從般若波羅蜜多而出生故；
translated: because all Tathāgatas, Arhats, Samyak-Saṃbuddhas and the Buddha's relics in the trichiliocosm are born from prajñā-pāramitā;

original: 又三千界佛設利羅，皆由般若波羅蜜多功德勢力所熏修故，得諸天、人、阿素洛等供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
analyzed: 又三千界佛設利羅，皆由般若波羅蜜多功德勢力所熏修故，得諸天、人、阿素洛等供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
translated: and also because the Buddha's relics in the trichiliocosm are perfumed and cultivated by the power of the merit and virtue of prajñā-pāramitā, they are worshipped, revered, honored, and praised by the devas, humans, and asuras.

original: 由此因緣，若善男子、善女人等，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎佛設利羅，決定不生諸險惡趣，常生善趣受諸富樂，隨心所願乘三乘法，畢竟證得三乘涅槃。
analyzed: 由此因緣，若善男子、善女人等，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎佛設利羅，決定不生諸險惡趣，常生善趣受諸富樂，隨心所願乘三乘法，畢竟證得三乘涅槃。
translated: For this reason, if good men and good women worship, revere, honor, and praise the Buddha's relics, they will definitely not be born in any evil destinies, but will always be born in good destinies and experience all kinds of wealth and happiness. According to their wishes, they will ride the Dharma of the Three Vehicles and ultimately attain nirvāṇa of the Three Vehicles.

original: 「復次，世尊！
analyzed: 「復次，世尊！
translated: Furthermore, Bhagavān!

original: 諸善男子、善女人等若見如來、應、正等覺，若見般若波羅蜜多甚深經典，此二功德平等無異。
analyzed: 諸善男子、善女人等若見如來、應、正等覺，若見般若波羅蜜多甚深經典，此二功德平等無異。
translated: If good men and good women see the Tathāgata, Arhat, Samyak-Saṃbuddha, or see this profound prajñā-pāramitā sūtra, these two merits are equal and no different.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 甚深般若波羅蜜多與諸如來、應、正等覺平等無二、無二分故。
analyzed: 甚深般若波羅蜜多與諸如來、應、正等覺平等無二、無二分故。
translated: It is because the profound prajñā-pāramitā is equal to the Tathāgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Enlightened Ones, without duality, without distinction.

original: 「復次，世尊！
analyzed: 「復次，世尊！
translated: Furthermore, World-Honored One!

original: 若有如來、應、正等覺住三示導，為諸有情宣說正法，所謂契經乃至論議，若善男子、善女人等於深般若波羅蜜多，受持、讀誦、廣為他說，此二功德平等無異。
analyzed: 若有如來、應、正等覺住三示導，為諸有情宣說正法，所謂契經乃至論議，若善男子、善女人等於深般若波羅蜜多，受持、讀誦、廣為他說，此二功德平等無異。
translated: If there are Tathāgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Enlightened Ones abiding in the three demonstrations, expounding the true Dharma for sentient beings, namely the sūtras up to the treatises, if good sons and good women receive and uphold the profound prajñā-pāramitā, recite it, and extensively explain it to others, these two merits are equal and no different.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 若彼如來、應、正等覺，若三示導，若所宣說十二分教，皆依般若波羅蜜多而出生故。
analyzed: 若彼如來、應、正等覺，若三示導，若所宣說十二分教，皆依般若波羅蜜多而出生故。
translated: It is because the Tathāgatas, Arhats, Perfectly Enlightened Ones, the three demonstrations, and the twelve divisions of the teachings they expound all arise from the prajñā-pāramitā.

original: 「復次，世尊！
analyzed: 「復次，世尊！
translated: Furthermore, World-Honored One!

original: 若十方界如殑伽沙諸佛世尊住三示導，為諸有情宣說正法，所謂契經乃至論議，若善男子、善女人等於深般若波羅蜜多，受持、讀誦、廣為他說。
analyzed: 若十方界如殑伽沙諸佛世尊住三示導，為諸有情宣說正法，所謂契經乃至論議，若善男子、善女人等於深般若波羅蜜多，受持、讀誦、廣為他說。
translated: If the Buddhas in the worlds of the ten directions, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, abiding in the three turnings of the wheel of the Dharma, expound the true Dharma for sentient beings, namely the sutras up to the treatises, if good men and good women receive and uphold the profound prajna paramita, recite it, and extensively explain it to others,

original: 此二功德平等無異。
analyzed: 此二功德平等無異。
translated: the merits of these two are equal and no different.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is this?

original: 若十方界如殑伽沙諸佛世尊，若三示導，若所宣說十二分教，皆依般若波羅蜜多而出生故。
analyzed: 若十方界如殑伽沙諸佛世尊，若三示導，若所宣說十二分教，皆依般若波羅蜜多而出生故。
translated: Because if the Buddhas in the worlds of the ten directions, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River, the three turnings of the wheel of the Dharma, and the twelve divisions of the teachings they expound, all arise from the prajna paramita.

original: 「復次，世尊！
analyzed: 「復次，世尊！
translated: Furthermore, World-Honored One!

original: 若善男子、善女人等以無量種上妙花鬘乃至燈明，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎十方世界如殑伽沙諸佛世尊；
analyzed: 若善男子、善女人等以無量種上妙花鬘乃至燈明，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎十方世界如殑伽沙諸佛世尊；
translated: If good men and good women use immeasurable kinds of supreme flower garlands and so forth up to lamps to make offerings, respect, and praise the Buddhas in the worlds of the ten directions, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River;

original: 有善男子、善女人等，書持般若波羅蜜多甚深經典，復以種種上妙花鬘乃至燈明供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
analyzed: 有善男子、善女人等，書持般若波羅蜜多甚深經典，復以種種上妙花鬘乃至燈明供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
translated: There are good sons and good women who write out and uphold this profound Prajñāpāramitā sūtra, and with various supreme flower garlands and so forth, make offerings, pay respects, venerate, and praise it.

original: 此二功德平等無異。
analyzed: 此二功德平等無異。
translated: These two merits are equal and no different.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is this?

original: 諸佛世尊皆依般若波羅蜜多而出生故。
analyzed: 諸佛世尊皆依般若波羅蜜多而出生故。
translated: Because all Buddha-World-Honored Ones are born from the profound Prajñāpāramitā.

original: 「復次，世尊！
analyzed: 「復次，世尊！
translated: Furthermore, World-Honored One!

original: 若善男子、善女人等於深般若波羅蜜多，至心聽聞、受持、讀誦、精勤修學、如理思惟、書寫、解說、廣令流布，彼於當來不墮地獄、傍生、鬼界，不墮聲聞及獨覺地。
analyzed: 若善男子、善女人等於深般若波羅蜜多，至心聽聞、受持、讀誦、精勤修學、如理思惟、書寫、解說、廣令流布，彼於當來不墮地獄、傍生、鬼界，不墮聲聞及獨覺地。
translated: If good sons and good women sincerely listen to, uphold, recite, diligently practice, contemplate according to the principles, write out, explain, and widely disseminate this profound Prajñāpāramitā, they will not fall into the hells, animal realms, or the realm of hungry ghosts in the future, and will not fall into the stages of śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is this?

original: 是善男子、善女人等決定當住不退轉地，遠離一切災橫、疾疫、衰惱、怖畏。
analyzed: 是善男子、善女人等決定當住不退轉地，遠離一切災橫、疾疫、衰惱、怖畏。
translated: These good men and good women will definitely abide in the stage of nonretrogression, and will be free from all calamities, epidemics, misfortunes, and fears.

original: 如負債人怖畏債主，即便親近奉事國王，依王勢力得免怖畏。
analyzed: 如負債人怖畏債主，即便親近奉事國王，依王勢力得免怖畏。
translated: It is like a debtor who is afraid of creditors, so he immediately becomes intimate with and serves the king, and by relying on the king's power he escapes from fear.

original: 王喻般若波羅蜜多，彼負債人喻善男子、善女人等，依恃般若波羅蜜多得離一切衰惱怖畏。
analyzed: 王喻般若波羅蜜多，彼負債人喻善男子、善女人等，依恃般若波羅蜜多得離一切衰惱怖畏。
translated: The king is a metaphor for prajñā-pāramitā, and the debtor is a metaphor for good men and good women. Relying on prajñā-pāramitā, they escape from all misfortunes and fears.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 譬如有人依附王故，王攝受故，為諸世人供養恭敬、尊重讚歎；
analyzed: 譬如有人依附王故，王攝受故，為諸世人供養恭敬、尊重讚歎；
translated: It is like a person who relies on the king, because he is accepted by the king, and is offered, revered, respected, and praised by the people of the world;

original: 佛設利羅亦復如是，由深般若波羅蜜多所熏修故，為諸天、人、阿素洛等供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
analyzed: 佛設利羅亦復如是，由深般若波羅蜜多所熏修故，為諸天、人、阿素洛等供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
translated: The Buddha's relics are also like this. Because they are perfumed and cultivated by prajñā-pāramitā, they are offered, revered, respected, and praised by devas, humans, asuras, and others.

original: 王喻般若波羅蜜多，佛設利羅喻依王者。
analyzed: 王喻般若波羅蜜多，佛設利羅喻依王者。
translated: The king is a metaphor for prajñā-pāramitā, and the Buddha's relics are a metaphor for relying on the king.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 諸佛所得一切智智，亦依般若波羅蜜多而得成就，是故我說假使充滿此三千界佛設利羅以為一分，有書般若波羅蜜多甚深經典復為一分，此二分中我意寧取甚深般若波羅蜜多。
analyzed: 諸佛所得一切智智，亦依般若波羅蜜多而得成就，是故我說假使充滿此三千界佛設利羅以為一分，有書般若波羅蜜多甚深經典復為一分，此二分中我意寧取甚深般若波羅蜜多。
translated: The omniscience attained by all Buddhas is also accomplished through prajñā-pāramitā. Therefore, I say that if this trichiliocosm were filled with the Buddha's relics as one part, and if there were a written copy of the profound prajñā-pāramitā as another part, I would choose the profound prajñā-pāramitā from these two parts.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 佛設利羅堅踰金剛具種種色，三十二相八十隨好所莊嚴身，如來十力廣說乃至一切相智，皆由般若波羅蜜多而成辦故。
analyzed: 佛設利羅堅踰金剛具種種色，三十二相八十隨好所莊嚴身，如來十力廣說乃至一切相智，皆由般若波羅蜜多而成辦故。
translated: Because the Buddha's relics, harder than vajra and endowed with various colors, the body adorned with the thirty-two marks and eighty minor marks, the Tathāgata's ten powers, and so forth up to omniscience, are all accomplished by prajñā-pāramitā.

original: 布施等五波羅蜜多，皆由般若波羅蜜多名到彼岸。
analyzed: 布施等五波羅蜜多，皆由般若波羅蜜多名到彼岸。
translated: The five perfections such as giving are all called pāramitā due to prajñā-pāramitā.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 若無般若波羅蜜多，施等不能到彼岸故。
analyzed: 若無般若波羅蜜多，施等不能到彼岸故。
translated: Because without prajñā-pāramitā, giving and so forth cannot reach the other shore.

original: 「復次，世尊！
analyzed: 「復次，世尊！
translated: Furthermore, World-Honored One!

original: 若此三千大千世界或餘世界所有王都、城邑、聚落，其中若有受持、讀誦、書寫、解說、供養恭敬甚深般若波羅蜜多，是處有情不為一切人、非人等之所惱害，唯除決定惡業應受，此中有情漸次修學三乘正行，隨其所願乃至證得三乘涅槃。
analyzed: 若此三千大千世界或餘世界所有王都、城邑、聚落，其中若有受持、讀誦、書寫、解說、供養恭敬甚深般若波羅蜜多，是處有情不為一切人、非人等之所惱害，唯除決定惡業應受，此中有情漸次修學三乘正行，隨其所願乃至證得三乘涅槃。
translated: If in this trichiliocosm or other worlds, in the royal capitals, cities, towns, and villages, there are those who uphold, recite, copy, explain, make offerings, and respectfully venerate the profound prajñā-pāramitā, the beings in those places will not be harmed by humans, non-humans, or others, except for those whose evil karma is certain to be experienced. The beings here will gradually study and practice the three vehicles, and according to their wishes, they will attain the nirvāṇa of the three vehicles.

original: 「復次，世尊！
analyzed: 「復次，世尊！
translated: Moreover, Bhagavān!

original: 甚深般若波羅蜜多於三千界作大饒益具大神力，隨所在處則為有佛作諸佛事，所謂利樂一切有情。
analyzed: 甚深般若波羅蜜多於三千界作大饒益具大神力，隨所在處則為有佛作諸佛事，所謂利樂一切有情。
translated: The profound prajñā-pāramitā greatly benefits the trichiliocosm and possesses great spiritual power. Wherever it is, there will be a Buddha performing the activities of a Buddha, namely benefiting and delighting all beings.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: Bhagavān!

original: 譬如無價大寶神珠，具無量種勝妙威德，隨所住處有此神珠，人及非人終無惱害。
analyzed: 譬如無價大寶神珠，具無量種勝妙威德，隨所住處有此神珠，人及非人終無惱害。
translated: It is like a priceless great divine jewel, possessing immeasurable kinds of supreme and wonderful spiritual power. Wherever this divine jewel is, humans and non-humans will never be harmed.

original: 設有男子或復女人，為鬼所執身心苦惱，若有持此神珠示之，由珠威力鬼便捨去。
analyzed: 設有男子或復女人，為鬼所執身心苦惱，若有持此神珠示之，由珠威力鬼便捨去。
translated: If there are men or women afflicted by ghosts, with pain in body and mind, if they have this divine pearl shown to them, by the pearl's powerful influence the ghosts will immediately leave.

original: 諸有熱病或風、或痰、或熱風痰合集為病，若有繫此神珠著身，如是諸病無不除愈。
analyzed: 諸有熱病或風、或痰、或熱風痰合集為病，若有繫此神珠著身，如是諸病無不除愈。
translated: All those with fevers, whether of heat, wind, or phlegm, or a combination of heat, wind, and phlegm, if they attach this divine pearl to their bodies, all such illnesses will be cured.

original: 此珠在闇能作照明，熱時能涼、寒時能暖，隨地方所有此神珠，時節調和不寒不熱。
analyzed: 此珠在闇能作照明，熱時能涼、寒時能暖，隨地方所有此神珠，時節調和不寒不熱。
translated: This pearl can illuminate darkness, cool when hot, and warm when cold. Wherever this divine pearl is, the seasons are balanced, not cold and not hot.

original: 若地方所有此神珠，蛇蝎等毒無敢停止。
analyzed: 若地方所有此神珠，蛇蝎等毒無敢停止。
translated: Wherever there is this divine pearl, snakes, scorpions, and other poisonous creatures dare not remain.

original: 設有男子或復女人，為毒所中楚痛難忍，若有持此神珠令見，珠威勢故毒即消滅。
analyzed: 設有男子或復女人，為毒所中楚痛難忍，若有持此神珠令見，珠威勢故毒即消滅。
translated: If there are men or women bitten by poisonous creatures, with pain unbearable, if they are shown this divine pearl, by the pearl's powerful influence the poison will immediately be eliminated.

original: 若諸有情身嬰癩疾、惡瘡、腫疱、目眩、瞖等、眼病、耳病、鼻病、舌病、喉病、身病、諸肢節病，帶此神珠眾病皆愈。
analyzed: 若諸有情身嬰癩疾、惡瘡、腫疱、目眩、瞖等、眼病、耳病、鼻病、舌病、喉病、身病、諸肢節病，帶此神珠眾病皆愈。
translated: If sentient beings have leprosy, malignant sores, blisters, eye diseases such as blindness or cataracts, ear, nose, tongue, throat, or body diseases, or diseases of the limbs and joints, if they wear this divine pearl, all their illnesses will be cured.

original: 若諸池沼泉井等中，其水濁穢或將枯涸，以珠投之水便盈滿，香潔澄淨具八功德；
analyzed: 若諸池沼泉井等中，其水濁穢或將枯涸，以珠投之水便盈滿，香潔澄淨具八功德；
translated: If the water in ponds, pools, springs, or wells is turbid, foul, or about to dry up, if the pearl is thrown into it, the water will immediately become full, fragrant, clear, and pure, endowed with the eight excellent qualities.

original: 若以青黃赤白紅紫碧綠雜綺種種色衣，裹此神珠投之於水，水隨衣綵作種種色。
analyzed: 若以青黃赤白紅紫碧綠雜綺種種色衣，裹此神珠投之於水，水隨衣綵作種種色。
translated: If the divine pearl is wrapped in various colored cloths such as blue, yellow, red, white, pink, purple, green, or multicolored, and thrown into the water, the water will take on the colors of the cloths.

original: 如是無價大寶神珠，威德無邊說不能盡，若置箱篋亦令其器具足成就無邊威德，設空箱篋由曾置珠，其器仍為眾人愛重。
analyzed: 如是無價大寶神珠，威德無邊說不能盡，若置箱篋亦令其器具足成就無邊威德，設空箱篋由曾置珠，其器仍為眾人愛重。
translated: Such a priceless great divine pearl has boundless majestic virtue that cannot be fully described. If it is placed in a box or basket, it will also cause those containers to be endowed with boundless majestic virtue. Even if an empty box or basket has previously contained the pearl, that container will still be cherished by many people.

original: 」具壽慶喜問帝釋言：
analyzed: 」具壽慶喜問帝釋言：
translated: The Venerable Ānanda asked Śakra, Lord of the Devas:

original: 「如是神珠為天獨有，人亦有耶？
analyzed: 「如是神珠為天獨有，人亦有耶？
translated: Do such divine jewels exist only in the heavens, or do humans also have them?

original: 」天帝釋言：
analyzed: 」天帝釋言：
translated: Śakra, Lord of the Devas, replied:

original: 「人中、天上俱有此珠，若在人中形小而重，若在天上形大而輕。
analyzed: 「人中、天上俱有此珠，若在人中形小而重，若在天上形大而輕。
translated: Both humans and devas have such jewels. If they are among humans, they are small and heavy, but if they are in the heavens, they are large and light.

original: 又人中珠相不具足，在天上者其相周圓，天上神珠威德殊勝無量倍數過人所有。
analyzed: 又人中珠相不具足，在天上者其相周圓，天上神珠威德殊勝無量倍數過人所有。
translated: Moreover, the characteristics of the jewels among humans are incomplete, but those in the heavens are perfectly complete in their characteristics. The divine jewels in the heavens have immeasurable and manifold superior virtues, far surpassing those possessed by humans.

original: 」時，天帝釋復白佛言：
analyzed: 」時，天帝釋復白佛言：
translated: Then, Śakra, Lord of the Devas, further addressed the Buddha, saying:

original: 「甚深般若波羅蜜多亦復如是，為眾德本，能滅無量惡不善法，隨所在處，令諸有情身心苦惱皆悉除滅，人、非人等不能為害。
analyzed: 「甚深般若波羅蜜多亦復如是，為眾德本，能滅無量惡不善法，隨所在處，令諸有情身心苦惱皆悉除滅，人、非人等不能為害。
translated: It is the same with the profound prajñā-pāramitā. It is the basis of various merits and can extinguish immeasurable unwholesome dharmas. Wherever it is, it causes the physical and mental suffering of all beings to be eliminated, and non-humans and so forth are unable to harm them.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 所說無價大寶神珠，非但喻於甚深般若波羅蜜多，亦喻如來一切智智，亦喻靜慮乃至布施波羅蜜多，亦喻內空乃至無性自性空，亦喻四念住乃至十八佛不共法，亦喻真如乃至不思議界，亦喻無忘失法、恒住捨性，亦喻一切智、道相智、一切相智，亦喻一切陀羅尼門、三摩地門，亦喻無量無邊佛法。
analyzed: 所說無價大寶神珠，非但喻於甚深般若波羅蜜多，亦喻如來一切智智，亦喻靜慮乃至布施波羅蜜多，亦喻內空乃至無性自性空，亦喻四念住乃至十八佛不共法，亦喻真如乃至不思議界，亦喻無忘失法、恒住捨性，亦喻一切智、道相智、一切相智，亦喻一切陀羅尼門、三摩地門，亦喻無量無邊佛法。
translated: The priceless great treasure-seal dhāraṇī that has been taught is not only a metaphor for the profound prajñā-pāramitā, it is also a metaphor for the Tathāgata's omniscience, and it is also a metaphor for the perfections of meditative concentration up to giving, and it is also a metaphor for the emptiness of internal phenomena up to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existent phenomena, and it is also a metaphor for the four establishments of mindfulness up to the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha, and it is also a metaphor for suchness up to the inconceivable realm, and it is also a metaphor for the factors of perfect enlightenment, the factors of complete awakening, and the factors of the path, and it is also a metaphor for the dhāraṇī gateways and the samādhi gateways, and it is also a metaphor for the immeasurable and boundless Buddha-dharmas.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 如是功德皆由般若波羅蜜多大神呪王之所引顯，功德深廣無量無邊，佛設利羅由諸功德所熏修故，佛涅槃後堪受一切世間天、人、阿素洛等供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
analyzed: 如是功德皆由般若波羅蜜多大神呪王之所引顯，功德深廣無量無邊，佛設利羅由諸功德所熏修故，佛涅槃後堪受一切世間天、人、阿素洛等供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
translated: These merits are all revealed by the great divine mantra king of prajñā-pāramitā. The merits are profound and vast, immeasurable and boundless. The Buddha's relics are able to receive the offerings, respect, reverence, and praise of all worlds, including devas, humans, and asuras, after the Buddha's nirvāṇa, because they are perfumed and cultivated by these merits.

original: 「復次，世尊！
analyzed: 「復次，世尊！
translated: Furthermore, World-Honored One!

original: 佛設利羅是極圓滿最勝清淨般若、靜慮、精進、安忍、淨戒、布施波羅蜜多廣說乃至永斷煩惱習氣相續及餘無量無邊佛法所依器故，佛涅槃後，堪受一切世間天、人、阿素洛等供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
analyzed: 佛設利羅是極圓滿最勝清淨般若、靜慮、精進、安忍、淨戒、布施波羅蜜多廣說乃至永斷煩惱習氣相續及餘無量無邊佛法所依器故，佛涅槃後，堪受一切世間天、人、阿素洛等供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
translated: The Buddha's relics are the vessel for the extremely perfect, supreme, pure prajñā, dhyāna, vigor, patience, morality, and giving pāramitās, and so forth, up to the uninterrupted continuation of the Buddha's immeasurable and boundless other dharmas, and therefore, after the Buddha's nirvāṇa, they are able to receive the offerings, respect, reverence, and praise of all worlds, including devas, humans, and asuras.

original: 「復次，世尊！
analyzed: 「復次，世尊！
translated: Furthermore, World-Honored One!

original: 佛設利羅是極圓滿最勝清淨功德珍寶波羅蜜多所依器故，是極圓滿最勝清淨、無染無淨、無生無滅、無入無出、無增無減、無來無去、無動無止、無此無彼波羅蜜多所依器故，是極圓滿最勝清淨諸法實性波羅蜜多所依器故，佛涅槃後堪受一切世間天、人、阿素洛等供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
analyzed: 佛設利羅是極圓滿最勝清淨功德珍寶波羅蜜多所依器故，是極圓滿最勝清淨、無染無淨、無生無滅、無入無出、無增無減、無來無去、無動無止、無此無彼波羅蜜多所依器故，是極圓滿最勝清淨諸法實性波羅蜜多所依器故，佛涅槃後堪受一切世間天、人、阿素洛等供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
translated: Because the Buddha's relics are the vessel of the perfection of the most perfect, supreme, pure, and precious merits and virtues, they are the vessel of the perfection of the most perfect, supreme, pure, undefiled and unpurified, unborn and unceasing, neither entering nor leaving, neither increasing nor decreasing, neither coming nor going, neither moving nor still, neither this nor that, they are the vessel of the perfection of the most perfect, supreme, pure, true nature of all dharmas, and after the Buddha's nirvana, they are worthy of receiving the offerings, respect, reverence, and praise of all worlds, including the gods, humans, and asuras.

original: 「復次，世尊！
analyzed: 「復次，世尊！
translated: Furthermore, World-Honored One!

original: 置三千界佛設利羅，假使充滿十方各如殑伽沙界佛設利羅以為一分，有書般若波羅蜜多甚深經典復為一分，此二分中我意寧取甚深般若波羅蜜多。
analyzed: 置三千界佛設利羅，假使充滿十方各如殑伽沙界佛設利羅以為一分，有書般若波羅蜜多甚深經典復為一分，此二分中我意寧取甚深般若波羅蜜多。
translated: Setting aside the Buddha's relics in the trichiliocosm, suppose the Buddha's relics were to fill worlds as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River in the ten directions, making one part, and there was the profound sutra of the perfection of wisdom made into another part, between these two parts, I would rather take the profound perfection of wisdom.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 一切如來、應、正等覺及設利羅，皆因般若波羅蜜多而出生故，皆由般若波羅蜜多所熏修故，皆為般若波羅蜜多所依器故，堪受一切世間天、人、阿素洛等供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
analyzed: 一切如來、應、正等覺及設利羅，皆因般若波羅蜜多而出生故，皆由般若波羅蜜多所熏修故，皆為般若波羅蜜多所依器故，堪受一切世間天、人、阿素洛等供養恭敬、尊重讚歎。
translated: Because all Tathāgatas, Arhats, Samyak-Saṃbuddhas and the relics of the Tathāgata are born from the perfection of wisdom, are perfumed and cultivated by the perfection of wisdom, and are the vessels supported by the perfection of wisdom, they are worthy of receiving offerings, respect, reverence, and praise from all worlds, including gods, humans, and asuras.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 若善男子、善女人等供養恭敬、尊重讚歎佛設利羅，天上、人中受諸富樂無有窮盡。
analyzed: 若善男子、善女人等供養恭敬、尊重讚歎佛設利羅，天上、人中受諸富樂無有窮盡。
translated: If good men and good women make offerings, respect, revere, and praise the relics of the Buddha, they will receive all kinds of wealth and happiness in the heavens and among humans without end.

original: 人中所謂剎帝利大族乃至居士大族，天上所謂四大王眾天乃至他化自在天，即由如是殊勝善根至最後身得盡苦際。
analyzed: 人中所謂剎帝利大族乃至居士大族，天上所謂四大王眾天乃至他化自在天，即由如是殊勝善根至最後身得盡苦際。
translated: Among humans, this refers to the great clans of kṣatriyas up to the great clans of householders, and in the heavens, this refers to the gods of the Heaven of the Four Kings up to the gods of the Heaven of Freely Partaking of the Pleasures Created in Other Heavens. By these supreme wholesome roots, they will attain the end of suffering in their final bodies.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 若善男子、善女人等於深般若波羅蜜多，至心聽聞、受持、讀誦、書寫、解說、如理思惟，甚深般若波羅蜜多速得圓滿。
analyzed: 若善男子、善女人等於深般若波羅蜜多，至心聽聞、受持、讀誦、書寫、解說、如理思惟，甚深般若波羅蜜多速得圓滿。
translated: If good men and good women sincerely listen to, uphold, read, recite, copy, explain, and contemplate the profound prajñā-pāramitā, the profound prajñā-pāramitā will quickly be perfected.

original: 甚深般若波羅蜜多得圓滿故，復令靜慮波羅蜜多乃至布施波羅蜜多乃至三十七菩提分法乃至十八佛不共法亦得圓滿。
analyzed: 甚深般若波羅蜜多得圓滿故，復令靜慮波羅蜜多乃至布施波羅蜜多乃至三十七菩提分法乃至十八佛不共法亦得圓滿。
translated: Because the profound prajñā-pāramitā is perfected, it will also cause the perfection of concentration, up to the perfection of giving, up to the thirty-seven factors of enlightenment, up to the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha to be perfected.

original: 由此復能超諸聲聞及獨覺地，證入菩薩正性離生，獲得菩薩勝妙神通。
analyzed: 由此復能超諸聲聞及獨覺地，證入菩薩正性離生，獲得菩薩勝妙神通。
translated: By this, one will be able to transcend the stage of the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas, enter the correct nature of separation from birth as a bodhisattva, and attain the excellent and wonderful spiritual powers of the bodhisattva.

original: 乘此神通遊諸佛國，從一佛土至一佛土，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎諸佛世尊，成熟有情、嚴淨佛土，發勝思願受種種身；
analyzed: 乘此神通遊諸佛國，從一佛土至一佛土，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎諸佛世尊，成熟有情、嚴淨佛土，發勝思願受種種身；
translated: Riding these spiritual powers, one will travel to the lands of the buddhas, going from one buddha land to another, making offerings, paying respect, venerating, and praising the Buddha Bhagavats, bringing sentient beings to maturity, purifying buddha lands, making excellent aspirations, and taking on various bodies;

original: 為欲饒益諸有情故，或作大輪王，或作小輪王，或作大國王，或作小國王，或作剎帝利，或作婆羅門，或作毘沙門，或作天帝釋，或作梵王，或作餘類，利益安樂無量有情。
analyzed: 為欲饒益諸有情故，或作大輪王，或作小輪王，或作大國王，或作小國王，或作剎帝利，或作婆羅門，或作毘沙門，或作天帝釋，或作梵王，或作餘類，利益安樂無量有情。
translated: In order to benefit sentient beings, they may become a great wheel-turning king, a small wheel-turning king, a great country king, a small country king, a kṣatriya, a brāhman, Vaiśravaṇa, Śakra Devānām-Indra, a Brahmā king, or other types, benefiting and bringing peace to innumerable sentient beings.

original: 是故，世尊！
analyzed: 是故，世尊！
translated: Therefore, World-Honored One!

original: 我於諸佛設利羅所，非不信樂供養恭敬、尊重讚歎，然於般若波羅蜜多甚深經典供養恭敬、尊重讚歎，所獲功德甚多於彼，由此因緣，我意寧取甚深般若波羅蜜多。
analyzed: 我於諸佛設利羅所，非不信樂供養恭敬、尊重讚歎，然於般若波羅蜜多甚深經典供養恭敬、尊重讚歎，所獲功德甚多於彼，由此因緣，我意寧取甚深般若波羅蜜多。
translated: I do not lack faith and joy in making offerings and paying respect to the Buddha's relics, but in making offerings and paying respect to the profound scriptures of prajñā-pāramitā, the merit obtained is much greater than that. For this reason, my mind would rather take the profound prajñā-pāramitā.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 若善男子、善女人等，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎甚深般若波羅蜜多，則為增長一切佛法，亦為攝受世、出世間富樂自在，如是已為供養恭敬、尊重讚歎佛設利羅及諸如來、應、正等覺。
analyzed: 若善男子、善女人等，供養恭敬、尊重讚歎甚深般若波羅蜜多，則為增長一切佛法，亦為攝受世、出世間富樂自在，如是已為供養恭敬、尊重讚歎佛設利羅及諸如來、應、正等覺。
translated: If good men and good women make offerings, pay respects, venerate, and praise the profound prajñā-pāramitā, they will increase all Buddha-dharmas and also embrace the worldly and world-transcending riches, happiness, and mastery. In this way, they will have already made offerings, paid respects, venerated, and praised the Buddha's relics and all Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Samyaksaṃbuddhas.

original: 」爾時，佛告天帝釋言：🔽「如是！
analyzed: 」爾時，佛告天帝釋言： 「如是！
translated: At that time, the Buddha told Śakra, Lord of the Devas:🔽It is so!

original: 如是！
analyzed: 如是！
translated: It is so!

original: 如汝所說。
analyzed: 如汝所說。
translated: As you have said.

original: 」8 福聚品第三分福聚品第八之一爾時，天帝釋白佛言：
analyzed: 」8 福聚品第三分福聚品第八之一爾時，天帝釋白佛言：
translated: Chapter 3: Accumulation of Blessings, Part 3, Chapter 8, Section 1. At that time, Śakra, Lord of the Devas, said to the Buddha:

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 若善男子、善女人等，欲得常見十方無量無數世界一切如來、應、正等覺法身、色身，當於般若波羅蜜多甚深經典至心聽聞、受持、讀誦、精勤修學、如理思惟、書寫、解說、廣令流布。
analyzed: 若善男子、善女人等，欲得常見十方無量無數世界一切如來、應、正等覺法身、色身，當於般若波羅蜜多甚深經典至心聽聞、受持、讀誦、精勤修學、如理思惟、書寫、解說、廣令流布。
translated: If good men and good women wish to always see the Dharma bodies and form bodies of all Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Samyaksaṃbuddhas in the innumerable and boundless worlds of the ten directions, they should listen to, uphold, read, recite, diligently practice, contemplate according to the meaning, copy, explain, and widely disseminate this profound prajñā-pāramitā sūtra with a sincere mind.

original: 是善男子、善女人等，既得常見十方無量無數世界一切如來、應、正等覺法身、色身，漸次修行甚深般若波羅蜜多令速圓滿，是時應以法性修習觀佛隨念。
analyzed: 是善男子、善女人等，既得常見十方無量無數世界一切如來、應、正等覺法身、色身，漸次修行甚深般若波羅蜜多令速圓滿，是時應以法性修習觀佛隨念。
translated: These good men and good women, having already been able to always see the Dharma bodies and form bodies of all Tathāgatas, Arhats, and Samyaksaṃbuddhas in the innumerable and boundless worlds of the ten directions, will gradually practice the profound prajñā-pāramitā and quickly perfect it. At that time, they should cultivate the contemplation of the Buddha's mindfulness according to the nature of dharmas.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 一切法性略有二種：
analyzed: 一切法性略有二種：
translated: The natures of all dharmas are generally of two kinds:

original: 一者、有為。
analyzed: 一者、有為。
translated: First, conditioned;

original: 二者、無為。
analyzed: 二者、無為。
translated: Second, unconditioned.

original: 云何名為有為法性？
analyzed: 云何名為有為法性？
translated: What is called the nature of conditioned dharmas?

original: 謂內空乃至無性自性空智，若四念住乃至十八佛不共法智，若善非善法智，若有記無記法智，若有漏無漏法智，若有為無為法智，若有罪無罪法智，若世間出世間法智，若雜染清淨法智，諸如是等無量門智，皆悉說名有為法性。
analyzed: 謂內空乃至無性自性空智，若四念住乃至十八佛不共法智，若善非善法智，若有記無記法智，若有漏無漏法智，若有為無為法智，若有罪無罪法智，若世間出世間法智，若雜染清淨法智，諸如是等無量門智，皆悉說名有為法性。
translated: That is, the wisdom of inner emptiness up to the emptiness of the essential nature of non-existence, the wisdom of the four establishments of mindfulness up to the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha, the wisdom of wholesome and unwholesome dharmas, the wisdom of conditioned and unconditioned dharmas, the wisdom of defiled and pure dharmas, such immeasurable wisdoms are all called the nature of conditioned dharmas.

original: 云何名為無為法性？
analyzed: 云何名為無為法性？
translated: What is called the nature of unconditioned dharmas?

original: 謂一切法無生無滅、無住無異、無染無淨、無增無減、無相無為、無性自性，如是說名無為法性。
analyzed: 謂一切法無生無滅、無住無異、無染無淨、無增無減、無相無為、無性自性，如是說名無為法性。
translated: It is said that all dharmas are unborn, unceasing, neither abiding nor changing, neither defiled nor pure, neither increasing nor decreasing, signless, unconditioned, and without essential nature. This is called the nature of unconditioned dharmas.

original: 是善男子、善女人等，應以如是二種法性，於諸如來、應、正等覺修佛隨念。
analyzed: 是善男子、善女人等，應以如是二種法性，於諸如來、應、正等覺修佛隨念。
translated: These good men and good women should cultivate the recollection of the Tathāgata, the Arhat, the Perfectly Enlightened One with regard to these two kinds of natures.

original: 」爾時，佛告天帝釋言：🔽「如是！
analyzed: 」爾時，佛告天帝釋言： 「如是！
translated: At that time, the Buddha told Śakra, Lord of the Devas:🔽It is so!

original: 如是！
analyzed: 如是！
translated: It is so!

original: 如汝所說。
analyzed: 如汝所說。
translated: As you have said,

original: 憍尸迦！
analyzed: 憍尸迦！
translated: Kauśika!

original: 過去未來現在諸佛，皆依般若波羅蜜多，已證當證現證無上正等菩提；
analyzed: 過去未來現在諸佛，皆依般若波羅蜜多，已證當證現證無上正等菩提；
translated: The Buddhas of the past, future, and present all rely on prajñā-pāramitā to have already realized, will realize, and are presently realizing supreme perfect enlightenment;

original: 過去未來現在諸佛聲聞弟子，皆依般若波羅蜜多，已得當得現得預流、一來、不還、阿羅漢果；
analyzed: 過去未來現在諸佛聲聞弟子，皆依般若波羅蜜多，已得當得現得預流、一來、不還、阿羅漢果；
translated: The śrāvaka disciples of the Buddhas of the past, future, and present all rely on prajñā-pāramitā to have already attained, will attain, and are presently attaining the fruits of stream-entry, once-returning, non-returning, and arhatship;

original: 過去未來現在獨覺，皆依般若波羅蜜多，已現當證獨覺菩提。
analyzed: 過去未來現在獨覺，皆依般若波羅蜜多，已現當證獨覺菩提。
translated: The pratyekabuddhas of the past, future, and present all rely on prajñā-pāramitā to have already realized, will realize, and are presently realizing pratyekabuddha enlightenment.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 憍尸迦！
analyzed: 憍尸迦！
translated: Kauśika!

original: 甚深般若波羅蜜多祕密藏中，廣說三乘相應法故。
analyzed: 甚深般若波羅蜜多祕密藏中，廣說三乘相應法故。
translated: Because the secret treasury of the profound prajñā-pāramitā extensively explains the dharmas associated with the Three Vehicles.

original: 然此所說以無所得為方便故，無性無相為方便故，無生無滅為方便故，無染無淨為方便故，無造無作為方便故，無入無出為方便故，無增無減為方便故，無取無捨為方便故，如是所說皆依世俗，不依勝義。
analyzed: 然此所說以無所得為方便故，無性無相為方便故，無生無滅為方便故，無染無淨為方便故，無造無作為方便故，無入無出為方便故，無增無減為方便故，無取無捨為方便故，如是所說皆依世俗，不依勝義。
translated: However, what is said here is for the sake of non-attainment as skillful means, for the sake of non-nature and non-characteristics as skillful means, for the sake of non-arising and non-cessation as skillful means, for the sake of non-defilement and non-purification as skillful means, for the sake of non-creation and non-action as skillful means, for the sake of non-entry and non-exit as skillful means, for the sake of non-increase and non-decrease as skillful means, for the sake of non-grasping and non-abandonment as skillful means. Such explanations are all based on the conventional, not on the ultimate truth.

original: 所以者何？
analyzed: 所以者何？
translated: Why is it so?

original: 甚深般若波羅蜜多非般若波羅蜜多、非非般若波羅蜜多，非此岸非彼岸非中流、非陸非水、非高非下、非平等非不平等、非有相非無相、非世間非出世間、非有漏非無漏、非有為非無為、非善非非善、非有記非無記、非過去非未來非現在。
analyzed: 甚深般若波羅蜜多非般若波羅蜜多、非非般若波羅蜜多，非此岸非彼岸非中流、非陸非水、非高非下、非平等非不平等、非有相非無相、非世間非出世間、非有漏非無漏、非有為非無為、非善非非善、非有記非無記、非過去非未來非現在。
translated: The profound prajñā-pāramitā is neither prajñā-pāramitā nor not prajñā-pāramitā, neither this shore nor the other shore nor the middle current, neither land nor water, neither high nor low, neither equal nor unequal, neither with characteristics nor without characteristics, neither worldly nor beyond the world, neither contaminated nor uncontaminated, neither conditioned nor unconditioned, neither good nor not good, neither indeterminate nor determinate, neither past nor future nor present.

original: 「憍尸迦！
analyzed: 「憍尸迦！
translated: Kauśika!

original: 甚深般若波羅蜜多，不與諸佛法，不與菩薩法，不與獨覺法，不與聲聞法，亦不棄捨異生諸法。
analyzed: 甚深般若波羅蜜多，不與諸佛法，不與菩薩法，不與獨覺法，不與聲聞法，亦不棄捨異生諸法。
translated: The profound prajñā-pāramitā does not accord with the dharmas of buddhas, does not accord with the dharmas of bodhisattvas, does not accord with the dharmas of pratyekabuddhas, does not accord with the dharmas of śrāvakas, and also does not abandon the dharmas of ordinary beings.

original: 」時，天帝釋復白佛言：
analyzed: 」時，天帝釋復白佛言：
translated: Then, the Lord of the Gods Śakra again addressed the Buddha, saying:

original: 「甚深般若波羅蜜多是大波羅蜜多，是無上波羅蜜多，是無等等波羅蜜多。
analyzed: 「甚深般若波羅蜜多是大波羅蜜多，是無上波羅蜜多，是無等等波羅蜜多。
translated: The profound prajñā-pāramitā is the great pāramitā, the unsurpassed pāramitā, the unequaled pāramitā.

original: 諸菩薩摩訶薩修行如是甚深般若波羅蜜多時，雖知一切有情心行境界差別，而不得我，不得有情乃至不得知者、見者，亦不得色、受、想、行、識，乃至不得六觸為緣所生諸受，亦復不得布施波羅蜜多乃至般若波羅蜜多，如是乃至不得十八佛不共法及餘無量無邊佛法。
analyzed: 諸菩薩摩訶薩修行如是甚深般若波羅蜜多時，雖知一切有情心行境界差別，而不得我，不得有情乃至不得知者、見者，亦不得色、受、想、行、識，乃至不得六觸為緣所生諸受，亦復不得布施波羅蜜多乃至般若波羅蜜多，如是乃至不得十八佛不共法及餘無量無邊佛法。
translated: When bodhisattva-mahāsattvas practice this profound prajñā-pāramitā, although they know the distinctions in the mental activities and realms of all sentient beings, they do not apprehend a self, do not apprehend a sentient being, up to do not apprehend one who knows and one who sees, and also do not apprehend form, feeling, perception, formation, or consciousness, up to do not apprehend the various feelings that arise with contact at the six sense bases as their condition, and also do not apprehend the pāramitā of giving, up to the pāramitā of wisdom, and likewise do not apprehend the eighteen distinctive abilities of the Buddha and the immeasurable and boundless Buddha-dharmas.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is this?

original: 非深般若波羅蜜多於一切法，依有所得而出現故。
analyzed: 非深般若波羅蜜多於一切法，依有所得而出現故。
translated: It is because the profound prajñā-pāramitā does not appear in relation to any dharmas based on apprehension.

original: 所以者何？
analyzed: 所以者何？
translated: Why is this?

original: 甚深般若波羅蜜多都無自性亦不可得，能得、所得及二依處性相皆空不可得故。
analyzed: 甚深般若波羅蜜多都無自性亦不可得，能得、所得及二依處性相皆空不可得故。
translated: The profound prajñā-pāramitā is utterly devoid of self-nature and cannot be attained, because the nature and characteristics of the attainer, the attained, and the two bases are all empty and cannot be attained.

original: 」爾時，佛告天帝釋言：🔽「如是！
analyzed: 」爾時，佛告天帝釋言： 「如是！
translated: At that time, the Buddha told Śakra, Lord of the Devas:🔽It is so!

original: 如是！
analyzed: 如是！
translated: It is so!

original: 如汝所說。
analyzed: 如汝所說。
translated: As you have said.

original: 憍尸迦！
analyzed: 憍尸迦！
translated: Kauśika!

original: 諸菩薩摩訶薩以無所得而為方便，長夜修學甚深般若波羅蜜多，尚不得菩提及薩埵，況得菩薩摩訶薩！
analyzed: 諸菩薩摩訶薩以無所得而為方便，長夜修學甚深般若波羅蜜多，尚不得菩提及薩埵，況得菩薩摩訶薩！
translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattvas, using non-attainment as their skillful means, have long cultivated the profound prajñā-pāramitā, yet they still do not attain enlightenment and the being, let alone attaining the bodhisattva-mahāsattva!

original: 既不得菩薩摩訶薩，豈得菩薩摩訶薩法！
analyzed: 既不得菩薩摩訶薩，豈得菩薩摩訶薩法！
translated: Since they do not attain the bodhisattva-mahāsattva, how can they attain the dharmas of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva!

original: 尚不得菩薩摩訶薩法，況得諸佛無上正等菩提！
analyzed: 尚不得菩薩摩訶薩法，況得諸佛無上正等菩提！
translated: Since they do not attain the dharmas of the bodhisattva-mahāsattva, how can they attain the unsurpassed perfect enlightenment of the buddhas!

original: 」時，天帝釋復白佛言：
analyzed: 」時，天帝釋復白佛言：
translated: Then Śakra, Lord of the Devas, again addressed the Buddha, saying:

original: 「諸菩薩摩訶薩為但應修甚深般若波羅蜜多，為亦應修餘五波羅蜜多耶？
analyzed: 「諸菩薩摩訶薩為但應修甚深般若波羅蜜多，為亦應修餘五波羅蜜多耶？
translated: Should the bodhisattva-mahāsattvas only cultivate the profound prajñā-pāramitā, or should they also cultivate the other five pāramitās?

original: 」爾時，佛告天帝釋言：
analyzed: 」爾時，佛告天帝釋言：
translated: At that time, the Buddha told Śakra, Lord of the Devas:

original: 「諸菩薩摩訶薩以無所得而為方便，具修六種波羅蜜多。
analyzed: 「諸菩薩摩訶薩以無所得而為方便，具修六種波羅蜜多。
translated: Bodhisattva-mahāsattvas, using non-apprehension as a skillful means, fully cultivate the six perfections.

original: 修布施時，不得布施，不得施者，不得受者；
analyzed: 修布施時，不得布施，不得施者，不得受者；
translated: When cultivating generosity, they do not apprehend generosity, the giver, or the recipient;

original: 修淨戒時，不得淨戒，不得持戒者，不得犯戒者；
analyzed: 修淨戒時，不得淨戒，不得持戒者，不得犯戒者；
translated: when cultivating morality, they do not apprehend morality, the one who upholds morality, or the one who violates morality;

original: 修安忍時，不得安忍，不得安忍者，不得忿恚者；
analyzed: 修安忍時，不得安忍，不得安忍者，不得忿恚者；
translated: when cultivating patience, they do not apprehend patience, the patient one, or the angry one;

original: 修精進時，不得精進，不得精進者，不得懈怠者，不得精進所應作事，不得能作若身若心；
analyzed: 修精進時，不得精進，不得精進者，不得懈怠者，不得精進所應作事，不得能作若身若心；
translated: when cultivating vigor, they do not apprehend vigor, the one who is vigorous, the lazy one, the activity that should be done with vigor, or the body or mind that does it;

original: 修靜慮時，不得靜慮，不得靜慮者，不得散亂者；
analyzed: 修靜慮時，不得靜慮，不得靜慮者，不得散亂者；
translated: when cultivating meditation, they do not apprehend meditation, the one who is in meditation, or the one who is distracted;

original: 修般若時，不得般若，不得具妙慧者，不得具惡慧者，不得般若所觀諸法性相差別。
analyzed: 修般若時，不得般若，不得具妙慧者，不得具惡慧者，不得般若所觀諸法性相差別。
translated: When cultivating prajñā-pāramitā, one does not attain prajñā, does not attain one endowed with wondrous wisdom, does not attain one endowed with evil wisdom, and does not attain the nature, characteristics, and distinctions of the dharmas observed by prajñā.

original: 「復次，憍尸迦！
analyzed: 「復次，憍尸迦！
translated: Furthermore, Kauśika!

original: 諸菩薩摩訶薩，甚深般若波羅蜜多為明為導，修習一切波羅蜜多，無所執著令速圓滿。
analyzed: 諸菩薩摩訶薩，甚深般若波羅蜜多為明為導，修習一切波羅蜜多，無所執著令速圓滿。
translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattvas, with the profound prajñā-pāramitā as their illumination and guide, cultivate all the pāramitās without attachment, causing them to quickly be perfected.

original: 「復次，憍尸迦！
analyzed: 「復次，憍尸迦！
translated: Furthermore, Kauśika!

original: 諸菩薩摩訶薩於一切法，以無所得而為方便，甚深般若波羅蜜多為明為導，雖觀諸法而無所著，令所修習速得圓滿，謂無所得而為方便，甚深般若波羅蜜多為明為導，雖觀諸蘊、諸處、諸界廣說乃至一切相智而無所著。
analyzed: 諸菩薩摩訶薩於一切法，以無所得而為方便，甚深般若波羅蜜多為明為導，雖觀諸法而無所著，令所修習速得圓滿，謂無所得而為方便，甚深般若波羅蜜多為明為導，雖觀諸蘊、諸處、諸界廣說乃至一切相智而無所著。
translated: The bodhisattva-mahāsattvas, with regard to all dharmas, using non-attainment as their skillful means, with the profound prajñā-pāramitā as their illumination and guide, although observing all dharmas, they are without attachment, causing their cultivation to quickly be perfected. That is to say, using non-attainment as their skillful means, with the profound prajñā-pāramitā as their illumination and guide, although observing the aggregates, sense bases, elements, and so forth up to the knowledge of all modes, they are without attachment.

original: 由此因緣，令所修習速得圓滿。
analyzed: 由此因緣，令所修習速得圓滿。
translated: For this reason, it causes the cultivation to quickly be perfected.

original: 憍尸迦！
analyzed: 憍尸迦！
translated: Kauśika!

original: 如贍部洲所有諸樹枝條、莖幹、花葉、果實，雖有種種形色不同，而其蔭影都無差別，具大功德眾所歸依，如是前五波羅蜜多雖各有異，而由般若波羅蜜多攝受，迴向一切智智，以無所得為方便故，諸差別相都不可得，具大功德眾所歸依。
analyzed: 如贍部洲所有諸樹枝條、莖幹、花葉、果實，雖有種種形色不同，而其蔭影都無差別，具大功德眾所歸依，如是前五波羅蜜多雖各有異，而由般若波羅蜜多攝受，迴向一切智智，以無所得為方便故，諸差別相都不可得，具大功德眾所歸依。
translated: Just as all the trees in Jambudvīpa, with their branches, trunks, flowers, leaves, and fruits, although having various different shapes and colors, their shade is all without distinction, endowed with great merit, and a refuge for the multitude. In the same way, although the first five perfections have their own differences, they are embraced by prajñā-pāramitā, dedicated to omniscience, and because of taking non-apprehension as a skillful means, all their distinguishing marks are utterly unobtainable, endowed with great merit, and a refuge for the multitude.

original: 」時，天帝釋復白佛言：
analyzed: 」時，天帝釋復白佛言：
translated: At that time, Śakra, Lord of the Devas, again addressed the Buddha, saying:

original: 「甚深般若波羅蜜多成就廣大殊勝功德，成就一切殊勝功德，成就圓滿殊勝功德，成就無量殊勝功德，成就無數殊勝功德，成就無邊殊勝功德，成就無等殊勝功德，成就無盡殊勝功德。
